msContents.summary: Tax register, recording day by day the collection of money taxes.

msItemStruct.note: Pub. status: Recto; Verso is blank
+ P.Cair. Inv. 57187; P.Iand. VII, 141; P.Mich. Inv. 2830; 3159; 4910

condition.ab: This light-brown papyrus is regularly cut at left and right. Kollesis near the left edge. (TC)

handDesc.p: Written in a quick but clear cursive. The scribe separated a new entry from the preceding one by underlining the name of the tax payer. Diairesis used occasionally. (TC)

origin.origPlace: Karanis, Herakleidou meris, Arsinoite nome, province of Egypt

keywords.term: see electronic version of P.Mich. IV, 224

div.ab: "(Column 19):;(Mecheir) 7 likewise:;Ptolemaios, son of Nestosiris, grandson of Petheus, mother Thermouthis, drachmas 4; ;Theabennis, son of Harphaesis, grandson of Theabennis, mother Thaesis, drachmas 8; ;Achillas, son of Ptollis, grandson of Hieranouphis, mother Thermouthis, drachmas 4, obols 28; ;Maron, son of Petheus the younger, grandson of Achorimphis, mother Apollonous, drachmas 4; ;Petheus, son of Onnophris, grandson of Petheus, mother Tapetsooukis, drachmas 8; ;Herakleides, son of Abykis, grandson of Abykis, mother Herais, drachmas 4; ;Onnophris, son of Menches, grandson of Onnophris, mother Thaseis, drachmas 4; ;Ptolemaios, son of Naaraus, grandson of Horion, mother Taorsenouphis, drachmas 4; ;Psenesis, son of Pharmenion, grandson of Psenesis, mother Tkonnos, drachmas 4;;Petheus, son of Sokmenis, grandson of Sokmenis, mother Thaesis, drachmas 4; ;Orsenouphis, son of Petheus, grandson of Horion, mother Tapetheus, drachmas 4; ;Ptolemaios, son of Orsenouphis, grandson of Satabous, mother Segathis, guard tax, drachmas 4; ;Ptolemaios, son of Leonides, grandson of Petheus, mother Thermouthis, drachmas 8; ;Ptolemaios, son of Harpagethes, grandson of Heras, mother Segathis, drachmas 4, obols 4;;12th year the same, obols 4 ? copper drachmas,;Karanos, son of Orsenouphis, grandson of Imouthes, mother Tapetsiris, drachmas 12; ;Pakysis, son of Phanomgeus, grandson of Pakysis, mother Tepheros, drachmas 4; ;Limnaios, son of Onnophris, grandson of Satabous, mother Ptolemas, drachmas 4; ;Apynchis, son of Pnepheros, grandson of Pakysis, mother Tasoucharion, drachmas 12;;Heron, son of Petheus, grandson of Teos, mother Taonnophris, drachmas 20; ;Chairemon, son of Pasoxis, grandson of Pasoxis, mother Tanephremis, obols 28;;in total for the day drachmas 128, [obols] 26 of which for12th year drachmas 4, obols 20;;(Mecheir) 8 likewise:;Aphrodisios, son of Ptolemaios, grandson of Petheus, mother Tapetesouchos, drachmas 4; ;Horos, son of Satabous, grandson of Horos, mother Theonis, drachmas 8; ;Heron, son of Sisois, grandson ofPetesouchos, mother Didymarion, drachmas 8;;Heron, son of Sabeinos, grandson of Pnepheros, mother Gaia, drachmas 4, obols 28; ;Petesouchos, son of Heraklas, grandson of Heraklas, mother Stiynchis, drachmas 4; ;Vettis, son of Petheus, grandson of Pnepheros, mother Taseus, drachmas 4; ;Ptolemaios, brother with the same mother, drachmas 8, obols 28; ;Petaus, son of Herieus, grandson of Petaus, mother Tlemenesis, drachmas 4; ;Sisois, son of Neilos, grandson of Euhemeros, mother Taeuhemeros, drachmas 12, obols 28;;for 12th year the same, copper obols 28;;Ptolemaios, son of Orsenouphis, grandson of Herieus, mother Anthia, drachmas 4;;Ptollas, son of Kommon, grandson of Ischyrion, mother Aphrodite, drachmas 4, copper drachmas 16;;Athenion, son of Horos, grandson of Pakysis, mother Heras, drachmas 8, obols 28;;Ptolemaios, son of Harpakysis, grandson of Satabous, mother Tasokonopis, drachmas 8;;in total for the day drachmas 112, obols 24 of which for the 12th year drachmas 24;;(Mecheir) 9 likewise:;Komon, fatherless, mother Tasoucharion, obols 28;;Melanas, son of Pakysis, grandson of Pakysis, mother Tanebkenis, drachmas 4;;Phanomgeus, son of Petheus, grandson of Satabous, mother Tamystha, drachmas 4;;Herakles, son of Mysthes, grandson of Petheus, mother Charis, drachmas 12;;Isas, son of Harpalos, grandson of Apion, mother Diodora, drachmas 20;;Ptolemaios, son of Harpagethes, grandson of Pnepheros, mother Thaesis, drachmas 8, obols 12;;Onnophris, son of Pasoknopiaos, grandson of Petsiris, mother Heros, drachmas 4;;Petaus, son of Onnophris, grandson of Petaus, mother Tkateis, drachmas 4;;Mysthes, son of Mysthes, grandson of Petsiris, mother Sambous policeman, guard, for the 12th year drachmas 4, obols 5, of Magdola, drachmas 7; in total drachmas 12."
